name: Moe Mekuri SP - 萌めくりSP -
description: The goal of this game is to turn all the panels to face up. You can choose the level stage from EASY, NORMAL, and HARD. However, in order to play the NORMAL stage, you need to have passed all the EASY stages, and to play the HARD stage, all the NORMAL stages.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 1.9GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Corresponding to OpenGL Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i7 3.5GHz Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: Corresponding to OpenGL Storage: 300 MB available space
